description: This file contains unit tests for filesystem-related classes such as File and Directory, using Google Test framework. It tests file creation, reading, writing, property checks, and directory iteration.

classes.name: File
classes.description: Represents a filesystem file, providing methods for creation, opening, reading, writing, moving, and property checks.

classes.name: Directory
classes.description: Represents a filesystem directory, allowing creation, iteration, and property verification.

methods.name: File::Create
methods.description: Creates a new file, optionally with write permissions.

methods.name: File::Open
methods.description: Opens the file for reading or writing.

methods.name: File::Append
methods.description: Prepares the file to append data.

methods.name: File::Size
methods.description: Returns the size of the file.

methods.name: File::FileName
methods.description: Extracts the filename from a path.

methods.name: File::FileNameExtended
methods.description: Extracts filename with extension from a path.

methods.name: File::PathName
methods.description: Extracts the directory path from a filepath.

methods.name: Directory::Next
methods.description: Iterates to the next directory entry.

methods.name: Directory::IsValid
methods.description: Checks if the directory is valid.

methods.name: Directory::Name
methods.description: Returns the name of the directory.

methods.name: Directory::IsDirectory
methods.description: Checks if a path is a directory.
